AI Description: libX11 is the X Window System protocol client library which provides an interface to the X Window System core protocol and provides higher-level functions for building window systems on top of the X Window System core.
Core Features: Implements The Client Side Of The X Window System Protocol, Provides Higher-Level Functions For Building Window Systems On Top Of The X Window System Core, Supports Window Creation, Management, & Event Handling, Enables Communication With The X Server For Display & Input Management
General Tags: X Window System, Client Library, Window System Interface, Graphics
